channel.title: How can I make it so you get faster exp?
channel.description: How can I make the exp faster when killing a monster, I have project czar source.

item.title: How can I make it so you get faster exp?
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

i have the same source so search for (client.java) if (FightType == 1) // Accurate

it should look like this

inCombat(); if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double) (150 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double) (150 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double) (150 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence); } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double) (150 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); }
or something well now to change the exp. do you see

TotalExp = (double) (150 * hitDiff);

change the 150 or what ever you have to a higher number GL reply if you have trouble

-Goodoo Dolls

Read full topic
